import { $, fs } from 'zx';
import { oneLine } from 'common-tags';
import { spawnSync } from 'child_process';


function checkFilesExists(files = []) {
  try {
    return files.reduce((acc, cur) => fs.existsSync(cur) && acc, true);
  } catch (e) {
    return false;
  }
};

async function zxRaw(cmd) {
  const escaping = $.quote;
  $.quote = (...all) => all;
  const res = await $`${cmd}`;
  $.quote = escaping;
  return res;
};

async function restartDfxBackgroundClean () {
  await $`dfx stop`;
  spawnSync('dfx', ['start', '--clean', '--background'], {
    detached: true,
    stdio: 'ignore',
  });
};

async function getCanisterId(dfxJsonName) { return `${await $`dfx canister id ${dfxJsonName}`}`.trim(); }
async function getCurrentDfxIdPrincipal() { return `${await $`dfx identity get-principal`}`.trim(); }

function uint8ArrayToCandidVec(subaccount) {
  return `vec { ${subaccount.reverse().reduce((acc, cur) => `${cur}; ${acc}`, "").slice(0, -2)}};`;
}

function getICRC1TokenCanisterDfxDeploymentCmd({ 
    mintersPrincipal,
    dfxJsonIcrc1CanisterName,
    tokenName, 
    tokenSymbol,
    fee = 10
  })
{
  return oneLine`dfx deploy ${dfxJsonIcrc1CanisterName} --argument '(variant { Init = 
    record { 
      token_symbol = "${tokenSymbol}";
      token_name =  "${tokenName}";
      minting_account = record { owner = principal"${mintersPrincipal}"; };
      transfer_fee = ${fee};
      metadata = vec { ${getLotusSvgLogo()} };
      initial_balances = vec {}; 
      archive_options = record {
        num_blocks_to_archive = 2000;
        trigger_threshold = 1000;
        controller_id = principal"${mintersPrincipal}";
      };
    }
  })'`;
};

const getICRC1TransferDfxCmd = ({
  amount = 10000000000,
  account
}) => {
  const { owner, subaccount = null } = account;
  const sub = subaccount ? `subaccount = opt ${uint8ArrayToCandidVec(subaccount)} ` : '';
  return oneLine`dfx canister call icrc1_token_canister icrc1_transfer '(
    record { 
        to = record {  
          owner = principal"${owner.toString()}";  
          ${sub}
        };
        amount = ${amount};
      }
  )'`;
}

const getLotusSvgLogo = () => {
  return `record { "icrc1:logo"; variant { Text = "data:image/svg+xml;base64," } };`
}

export {
  checkFilesExists, 
  zxRaw, 
  restartDfxBackgroundClean, 
  getCurrentDfxIdPrincipal,
  getCanisterId,
  getICRC1TokenCanisterDfxDeploymentCmd,
  getICRC1TransferDfxCmd,
};
